name: Everlasting Hyperlight Vegan Transfer-Proof Liquid Lipstick
about: What it is: An iconic liquid lipstick with all-day, transfer-proof wearâ€”now in a hyper-lightweight, comfortable formula...Formulation Type: Liquid Lipstick..Benefits: Long-wearing..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Raspberry Stem Cells: Nourish lips and provide all-day comfort...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Feather-resistant with a non-drying feel, this flexible formula moves with your lips to prevent caking and flaking while the slim precision tip gives you complete control. The high-pigment, matte shades of petal-soft neutrals and intoxicating pops are named after poisonous plants and bizarre blooms...Clinical Results: In a consumer study on 32 volunteers, immediately after application:.- 100% agreed it was highly pigmented..After 8 hours of wear:.- 100% agreed it felt comfortable on lips.- 97% agreed it was lightweight
ingredients: -Raspberry Stem Cells: Nourish lips and help provide all-day comfort...Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Trisiloxane, Isododecane, Cera Microcristallina/Microcrystalline Wax/Cire Microcristalline, Mica, Isononyl Isononanoate, Cetyl Dimethicone, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Illite, Alcohol Denat., C30-45 Alkyl Dimethicone, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ethyl Vanillin, Laureth-4, Aqua/Water/Eau, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Leaf Extract, BHT, Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-On clean, dry lips, use the precision tip to line and define..-Fill in with the angled edge. .-Let it set for about 30 seconds to lock in bold-matte color (no rubbing or smacking).
